sentence: Why cant trigonometry teachers give good speeches? they go off onto different tangents.
explanation: A tangent is a line that touches a curve at a single point without crossing it.
first_new_sentence: The tangent to the curve at that point can give us the slope of the curve at that position.
second_new_sentence: The tangent of an angle is equal to the ratio of the length of the opposite side to the length of the adjacent side.

sentence: What do you call the useless piece of skin on the end of the penis? the man.
explanation: A man is an adult human male.
first_new_sentence: The man in the backyard was fixing his fence.
second_new_sentence: The man who made the best sandwiches at the deli is retiring.
